section_title: COP/MOP Decision on Guidelines for Article 6 (Joint Implementation)
sentences: This decision (FCCC/KP/CMP/2005/3/Add.3) defines the JI Supervisory Committee (JISC) and criteria for participating in JI.
Host countries fulfilling all criteria may verify emissions reductions by themselves (first track); others must use procedures involving 'accredited independent entities' and the JISC (second track).
enb_long_title: Eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties to the Climate Change Convention and first meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol
